CodeList.Name: Coronary Artery Dissection NHLBI Grade Responses

Description.TranslatedText: A terminology codelist relevant to the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute grade for coronary artery dissection and perforation.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Minor radiolucencies within the lumen during contrast injection with no persistence after dye clearance. (Adapted from: Coronary artery angiographic changes after PTCA: Manual of Operations NHLBI PTCA Registry 1985-6:9)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: NHLBI Coronary Artery Dissection Type A

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Parallel tracts or double lumen separated by a radiolucent area during contrast injection with no persistence after dye clearance. (Adapted from: Coronary artery angiographic changes after PTCA: Manual of Operations NHLBI PTCA Registry 1985-6:9)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: NHLBI Coronary Artery Dissection Type B

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Extraluminal cap with persistence of contrast after dye clearance from the lumen. (Adapted from: Coronary artery angiographic changes after PTCA: Manual of Operations NHLBI PTCA Registry 1985-6:9)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: NHLBI Coronary Artery Dissection Type C

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Spiral luminal filling defect with delayed but complete distal flow. (Adapted from: Coronary artery angiographic changes after PTCA: Manual of Operations NHLBI PTCA Registry 1985-6:9)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: NHLBI Coronary Artery Dissection Type D

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: New persistent filling defect with delayed antegrade flow. May represent thrombus. (Adapted from: Coronary artery angiographic changes after PTCA: Manual of Operations NHLBI PTCA Registry 1985-6:9)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: NHLBI Coronary Artery Dissection Type E

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Non-A-E types with total coronary occlusion and no distal antegrade flow. May represent thrombus. (Adapted from: Coronary artery angiographic changes after PTCA: Manual of Operations NHLBI PTCA Registry 1985-6:9)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: NHLBI Coronary Artery Dissection Type F

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Coronary Artery Dissection NHLBI Grade Responses
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM NHLBI Coronary Artery Dissection Grade Responses Terminology
